title: Batman AK All DLCs, Story Pack & Skins READ-INFO FIRST
description:
So first of to say, I honestly don't know if this stuff will work with the CPY (cracked version of the game) I have the steam version of the game that didn't have ANYTHING from here and I just copy and pasted this stuff to the DLC folder and it worked for me.

I just wanted the Batgirl story pack DLC and I found this stuff on some site and it's working for me played the Batgirl story for 5 minutes without any problems.
But if you don't mind the size and want to try it with the cracked version of the game download and if it works for you enjoy and please leave a comment to let others know if it works. THANKS!

Like I said not sure how DLC's work or if they need to be cracked also like the base game but I'm guessing not so this probably will work with the CPY (cracked) game. If you have a fast internet and don't mind the size and want all this it's worth a try right?
I spent months searching just for the Batgirl DLC's downloaded gb and gb of files but it was finally worth the effort :)

So how to use this:
Delete everything from the Arkham Knight's DLC folder (make a backup)
Extract the downloaded file.
After you extracted it, copy and paste the DLC folder to the Arkham Knight folder.

Batman Inc DLC Skin
Crime Fighter Challenge Pack #6
Just Copy And Paste to DLC folder
